quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: General Hospital and Degrassi
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, caroline. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: The 4 Musketeers, Elizabeth and Lucky Spencer, Emily Quartermaine and Nicholas Cassadine, often eat dinner together with ribs from what restaurant?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Elis

questions.question: How is Jasper Jacks related to the madman James Craig who held the Metro Court hotel guests hostage for twelve hours?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: His brother

questions.question: On the soap opera General Hospital, Elizabeth has two children, Cameron and Jake. Jake is named with his father Jasons initials (Jacob Martin, Jason Morgan). But who is Cameron named after?

options.text: No one, Elizabeth just liked the name

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: His grandfather

questions.question: Degrassi: The Next Generation is the indirect result of Degrassi Junior High, which aired on CBC in Canada and PBS in the United States, in what year?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1987

questions.question: Christine Spike Nelson is a hairdresser and mother of Emma, with whom she was pregnant in the original series of Degrassi: The Next Generation.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: What Degrassi: The Next Generation character, played by actress Cassie Steele, was more or less Emma Nelsons sidekick in the first two seasons, but in season three debuted a new look and personality?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Manny

questions.question: Sarah Brown originated the role of Caroline Benson (aka Carly Corinthos) on General Hospital.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: On Canaidan TV show, Degrassi: The Next Generation, what actress playes the role of Paige Michalchuk?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lauren Collins

questions.question: Which three-time daytime Emmy award winning actor played the original Lucky Spencer from 1993-1999?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jonathan Jackson

questions.question: Actress Kimberly McCullough (Robin Scorpio) also played the role of Patty Hollawell on the TV show Charmed.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: The American broadcaster of Degrassi: The Next Generation, The-N, has repeatedly censored episodes, editing them in ways to make them, in their opinion, more acceptable to the American audience.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: In the series iCarly, Sam pays a lot attention to her boyfriend Jonah.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Rebecca Herbst, who plays the role of Elizabeth Webber on General Hospital, married another GH cast member. He has since left the show but his characters name was Juan Santiago. Which actor played him?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Michael Saucedo

questions.question: On General Hospital, who has lawyer Alexis Davis not been romantically involved with?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jasper (Jax) Jacks

questions.question: Laura Spencer had two children.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Alien and Monty Python
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, john, jethro. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In Monty Python’s Flying Circus, what kind of animal is John Cleese attempting to return to Michael Palins pet shop?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A parrot

questions.question: Which famous composer wrote the classic Liberty Bell March that is the theme song to the show Monty Python’s Flying Circus?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: John Philip Sousa

questions.question: Who attempts to have a debate with John Cleese in the sketch Argument Clinic?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Michael Palin

questions.question: What is the first lesson on the Monty Python sketch How Not to Be Seen?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Not to stand up

questions.question: What year did Monty Pythons Flying Circus debut on the BBC?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1969

questions.question: Dennis Moore, the forgetful highwayman from Monty Pythons Flying Circus, carries a bag in which to put the loot.  What is written on the side of this bag?

options.text: Er, um, what word is it?

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Swag

questions.question: To which political party does Monty Python character Jethro Q. Walrust*tty belong?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Silly

questions.question: Which of these Degrassi: The Next Generation characters does the following description best fit?  The good-looking and quiet daughter of a widowed father, she has insecurities about her appearance, due to the fact that she is more curvaceous than her thin peers.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Terri MacGregor

questions.question: This Alien could easily hide in a bowl of Jello Pudding, but if you ate that bowl you might be eating a considerable amount of human flesh!

options.text: The Thing That Ate New York

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Blob

questions.question: This member of Python, who played King Arthur in Monty Python and the Holy Grail, was wont to play authority figures on the Monty Python show.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Graham Chapman

questions.question: This half-human alien had pointed ears, green blood and could incapacitate his victims with a simple touch. He flew around in an unidentified flying object invading other planets throughout space, or the final frontier, (as his captain referred to it).
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mr. Spock

questions.question: The aliens from this movie forced a simple man to build a facsimile of the Devils Tower out of his mashed potatoes. What is the name of the movie where this horrible event takes place?

options.text: Close Encounters of the Third Kind

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Close Encounters of the Third Kind

questions.question: This horribly disfigured creature from a galaxy far away used to look human before he took on his true alien form as cyborg (after a particularly bad beating from another alien). He rose to second in command of The Galactic Empire.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Darth Vader

questions.question: This alien had horrible laser and x-ray vision and super strength. He didnt need his UFO to fly. He was made of steel and often disguised himself as human. Who was this being from another planet?

options.text: The robot from The Day the Earth Stood Still.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Superman

questions.question: Which character on That 70s Show is based on the adolescence of show creator Mark Brazill?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Eric

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: South Park and Episode
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, title, line. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What episode of South Park, aired 5 days after the premiere of Team America: World Police, was produced in less than 3 days?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Douche and Turd

questions.question: Which of these bands did NOT appear on the South Park music album, Chef Aid?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Styx

questions.question: Midge and Bob Pinciotti from the sitcom That 70s Show were born in the same year.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: When the South Park episode, “Cartman Joins NAMBLA” was produced, what was the only problem Comedy Central had, content-wise, before airing?

options.text: Kennys dad constantly throwing up and having diarrhea issues

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The John Denver joke

questions.question: Which of these episodes of South Park has not been aired on Comedy Central since its original premiere?

options.text: Terrance and Phillip in Not Without My Anus

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jared Has Aides

questions.question: What song was featured in the South Park episode “Mr. Hankey’s Christmas Classics,” but NOT featured on the album that followed it?

options.text: Have Yourself a Merry Little Christmas

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jesus and Santas Duet

questions.question: In what two South Park episodes was the C word uttered uncensored?

options.text: Something You Can Do With Your Finger and It Hits the Fan
Raisins and It Hits the Fan
Something You Can Do With Your Finger and Raisins
It Hits the Fan and Clubhouses

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Something You Can Do With Your Finger and Raisins

questions.question: What is the first episode of South Park that allowed the usage of the word fag?

options.text: The Return of the Fellowship of the Rings to the Two Towers

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: It Hits the Fan

questions.question: Is it true that in the pilot episode of That 70s Show, Red said he would love to drive a Toyota?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: No

questions.question: Was Teenage Wasteland the working title for That 70s Show?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yes

questions.question: According to the South Park Season 3 DVD Mini-Commentaries, what is Danny DeVito’s favorite episode?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: World Wide Recorder Concert

questions.question: What Hollywood director had two of his movies parodied in two South Park episodes in a row?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Zak Snyder

questions.question: Which of these episodes of South Park has NOT been nominated for a Primetime Emmy?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Goobacks

questions.question: The actress who played Midge on That 70s Show, also was on Charlies Angels.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: What world-famous line from South Park delivered by the character Cartman, was almost taken out of the show?

options.text: Whateva! I do what I want!
You shut your bitch-ass up and make me some pie!
No, Kitty, this is MY potpie!

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: No, Kitty, this is MY potpie!

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Pluto and South Park
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, people. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Which one of these voice actors did not voice Pluto?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Daws Butler

questions.question: Which voice actor started voicing Pluto in 1990?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bill Farmer

questions.question: What was the name of Plutos son?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Pluto, Jr.

questions.question: What TV personality said, People always assume that you cant be shy and be on television. Theyre wrong.?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Diane Sawyer

questions.question: Between 1952 and 1962, Pluto appeared in ten issues of the Four Color Comics series.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Name the very popular writer of screenplays who said, There is no reason to confuse television news with journalism.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Nora Ephron

questions.question: What was the name of  Plutos kid brother?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: K.B.

questions.question: In what year did the popular cartoon character Pluto make his debut?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1930

questions.question: What episode of South Park does NOT have any mention or references to Crab People?

options.text: Two Days Before the Day After Tomorrow

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Make Love, Not Warcraft

questions.question: Which one of these was a friend of Plutos?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Fifi the Pekingese

questions.question: What was the first animated film in which Pluto appeared?

options.text: The Adventures of a Boy and His  Dog

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Chain Gang

questions.question: Who was  Plutos first owner?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Minnie Mouse

questions.question: Which one of these characters was not an enemy of Pluto?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dinah the Dachshund

questions.question: According to Season 6 of South Park, what destroys society?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bebes boobs

questions.question: What co-star of the film BASEketball supplies a voice in the two-part episodes of South Park, “Do the Handicapped Go to Hell?” and “Probably”?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dian Bachar

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Television and White Shadow
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, coach, gum. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What was the name of the basketball coach in the TV series The White Shadow?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Coach Reeves

questions.question: Which quote is by the Australian-born wit Clive James?

options.text: The trouble was all people saw on television were a few of my outspoken supporters out  front and they came away thinking that was me.
The car trip can draw the family  together, as it was in days before television when parents and children actually talked  to each other.
Sometimes cameras and television are good  to people and sometimes they arent. I dont know if its the way you say it, or how you look.
Television is simultaneously blamed often by the same people, for worsening the world and for being powerless to change it.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Television is simultaneously blamed often by the same people, for worsening the world and for being powerless to change it.

questions.question: In the pilot episode of The White Shadow, the Coach played Coolidge and Thorpe, two against one,   and beat them.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: When did The White Shadow run on TV?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1978-1981

questions.question: In the TV series The White Shadow, the Carver High Principal and  the Coach attended the same college. Which one?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Boston College

questions.question: On the TV show The White Shadow, the Coach was cut from which NBA team?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Chicago Bulls

questions.question: Where was Carver High School located on the CBS show The White Shadow?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: South Central Los Angeles, California

questions.question: Who delivered these words: Television has  brought murder back to the home where it belongs.?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Alfred Hitchcock

questions.question: Which of these is NOT a quote by the New Zealand writer /comic Tony Folliani?

options.text: Karl Marx is wrong. Television is the opiate of the people.
Sometimes the highlight of the day is watching highlights.
Why do they call TV a medium? Because its rare when its well done.
You shouldnt spend your life watching TV. You should spend your life selling TVs.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Why do they call TV a medium? Because its rare when its well done.

questions.question: Who said, Television has  done much for psychiatry, spreading information about it as well as the need for it.?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Alfred Hitchcock

questions.question: This panelist on an early TV quiz show stated, Television is the triumph of machine over people.?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Fred Allen

questions.question: Who starred as The White Shadow  in the TV show of the same name?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ken Howard

questions.question: Who made the statement, Television is chewing gum for the eyes.?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Frank Lloyd Wright

questions.question: What was the name of the starting center on the Carver High team in the series The White Shadow?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Warren Coolidge

questions.question: Moral passion without  entertainment is propaganda and propaganda without moral passion is  television. Name the author who delivered these words.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Rita Mae Brown

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: White Shadow and The White Shadow
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, nickname, coach. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Who was the only member of the team on the show The White Shadow who recognized the Coach as  a former NBA player?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Abner Goldstein

questions.question: The Coach and Coolidge from The White Shadow did a TV commercial for which TV station?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: ESPN

questions.question: What is the prison nickname of Lincoln Burrows, a character from the Prison Break TV series, portrayed by Dominic Purcell?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Linc the Sink

questions.question: Which cast member of The White Shadow directed 16 episodes of  The Sopranos and 4 episodes of Sex And the City?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tim Van Patten

questions.question: The cast members of The White Shadow did their own singing in the shower scenes.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Lincoln Burrows from Prison Break had to write the names of the observers of his execution. Whose name did he put in the application form?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: None of these

questions.question: Who played Mario Salami Petrinno in the TV series The White Shadow?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tim Van Patten

questions.question: The actors who play Zack and Cody on the popular self-titled show are brothers in real life.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: What is the name of the hotel manager on the show The Suite Life of Zack  Cody?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Moseby

questions.question: Which statement concerning the show The White Shadow is not correct?

options.text: Rosey Grier played the school wrestling coach.
Carver High won the Chicago High School Championship twice during the shows run.
Bruce Paltrow, father of Gwenyth Paltrow, produced the show.
The actor who played the Coach starred in the play and movie 1776.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Carver High won the Chicago High School Championship twice during the shows run.

questions.question: What is the name of the candy counter girl on the Disney show The Suite Life of Zack  Cody?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Maddie

questions.question: Which cast member of The White Shadow directed Save the Last Dance and Coach Carter?

questions.question: Which character from the White Shadow appeared on the show St. Elsewhere?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Coollidge

questions.question: The White Shadow is considered the first prime time show  with a predominantly black cast.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Michael Scofield, a character in the TV series, Prison Break, who pretends to be a type I diabetic, needs what medicine to block the action of insulin?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Pugnac
